entry.title: New release for Tasks.md: 2.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feature: Greatly improves drag and drop experience: New swap animations, visual indications and better interactions for touch and mobile devices;
  • Feature: Adds autoscroll when you drag cards and lanes partially out their container;
  • Bugfix: Fix touch and navigation on touch devices;
  • Bugfix: Fix issue where navigation bar outgrows lanes;
  • Bugfix: Prevents saving card name with invalid characters;
  • Bugfix: Fix some smaller issues;
  • Documentation: Remind user to hard-reload the browser after changing a theme.

New Contributors

  • @azzamsa made their first contribution in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/97

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/compare/2.3.2...2.4.0

entry.title: New release for Tasks.md: 2.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feature: Generate an initial color for a new tags based on their names by @Akashic101 in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/110
  • Feature: Add new tag name input validation by @Akashic101 and @BaldissaraMatheus in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/110
  • Fix: Use environment variables in Dockerfile ENTRYPOINT by @tarikalim in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/116
  • Fix: Allow dragging cards when sort is applied by @BaldissaraMatheus in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/116
